author: Darragh Roche
title: Kyiv Latest: Russian Forces Look To 'Encircle' Ukraine's Fortified Capital
description: Here's the latest on Kyiv, where an intelligence update suggests Russian forces could once again be planning to take the city.
content:
Amid the din of air-raid sirens, Kyiv waits.
Russian forces are manoeuvring to encircle the Ukrainian capital, Western intelligence suggest, while fighting escalates outside the fortified city of neâ€¦ [+6262 chars]
